product_name: Giro Privateer HV Bike Shoes - Men's
long_description: The men's Giro Privateer HV Bike Shoes offer great versatility and performance on the trail and are designed especially to fit high-volume and extra-wide feet. High-quality, breathable microfiber uppers feature a reinforced toe box and rubber toe cap. Micro-ratcheting buckle (replaceable) and two straps with offset D-ring at midfoot secure the fit without pressure points. Extra-stiff nylon outsole rivals the performance of more expensive composite designs. Agressive, dual-density lugs give excellent traction in dirt and mud, and can be outfitted with toe spikes. Supportive molded EVA footbed with medium arch support and antimicrobial treatment enhances comfort and fit. Giro Privateer HV Bike Shoes offer men with high-volume feet a comfortable ride.
short_description: The men's Giro Privateer HV Bike Shoes offer great versatility and performance on the trail and are designed especially to fit high-volume and extra-wide feet.
